messages.subject: Re: the phrase in question on the certificate of ...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Sorry I have not been on for a while, although new to this site, but the pc had been suffering, also taking my father to daily radiotherapy..... I just
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Sorry I have not been on for a while, although new to this site, but
the pc had been suffering, also taking my father to daily
radiotherapy.....

I just love this Certificate and have it printed off!!

How about....
>>>by allowing your family's schedule to folow its own route wherever
it may lead without outside interference<<<<

Sonia

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, SandraDodd@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 6/30/2004 1:36:00 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
> I think I'd change it to say something along the lines of "you
> may stop outsiders from harming your children by controling your
> family's schedule/learning/life/socialization/whatever".
> =======
>
> But that might make it suggest even more strongly that the parents
can harm
> their children by controlling their schedue/learning...
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: the phrase in question on the certificate of ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/30/2004 1:36:00 PM Mountain Daylight Time, I think I d change it to say something along the lines of you may stop outsiders from harming
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/30/2004 1:36:00 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
I think I'd change it to say something along the lines of "you
may stop outsiders from harming your children by controling your
family's schedule/learning/life/socialization/whatever".
=======

But that might make it suggest even more strongly that the parents can harm
their children by controlling their schedue/learning...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
